  * Creates a customizable email collection form that can be embedded on your website ğŸŒ

## Setup âš™ï¸

  1. Set up a free [Hunter.io](http://Hunter.io) account for email verification
  2. Configure your SendGrid account credentials
  3. Customize the email collection form fields
  4. Get the embedded form code for your website



## How to adjust it to your needs ğŸ”§

  * Add additional form fields beyond just email collection
  * Customize the form's appearance and labels
  * Modify the verification logic based on your requirements
  * Connect to different email marketing platforms instead of SendGrid
  * Add additional automation steps after email verification



## Benefits ğŸŒŸ

  * No monthly subscription fees for email collection ğŸ’¸

  * Scalable solution that won't lock you into expensive plans ğŸ“ˆ
  * Clean email list with only verified addresses âœ¨
  * Simple setup and customization ğŸ¯



This workflow is perfect for bloggers, small businesses, and anyone looking to build an email list without getting locked into expensive email marketing platforms as their subscriber count grows! ğŸš€
